dict.acceptation: 妈妈；木乃伊；干尸；干瘪的人；

sent.orig: She don't want me to sing, "You're makin mummy cry, why, why's mummy crying?"
sent.trans: 她不想我再唱歌[你让妈咪哭了，为什么。为什么妈咪要哭]

sent.orig: Fixed a bug mummies cured of their mummy status to retain the mummy walk style.
sent.trans: 修正了模拟市民在解除木乃伊的诅咒恢复正常时走路姿势却还未恢复正常的错误。

sent.orig: Daddy where's mummy? I can't find mummy, where is she?
sent.trans: “爸爸，妈妈在哪里？我找不到她，她在那里？”。

sent.orig: Mummy finger, Mummy finger, where are you?
sent.trans: 妈咪手指，妈咪手指，你在哪里？

sent.orig: You're makin mummy cry, why, why's mummy crying?
sent.trans: 你让妈咪哭泣为什麽为什麽妈咪在哭泣？
